wikipedia_page.main: David Weston (1935–2011) was a British industrial artist and author.

response: *David Weston - artist and author - born in Belgrave.
* Introduction for Beware of Trains by (the unrelated) David Weston.

The game itself took three days and three nights for Bruce Halpenny to design, and then three years to bring onto the market.Stealing the show.  Toy Retailing News - Volume 2 Number 4 - December 1976 - page 2  The famous train artist David Weston was commissioned by Bruce Halpenny to paint the box.
* David Weston (artist) (1935–2011), British industrial artist and author
* David Weston (actor) (born 1938), English actor, director and author
